thread.section_title: Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fresh and convenient
thread.title_full: Fresh and convenient - Review of Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Enis-architect
title: Fresh and convenient
text: We just visited London and stayed in Staybridge Vauxhall. It is fresh and modern. Nice service. Very high tech. Even you have apple tv in the room. Rooms are spacious and breakfast is simple but sufficient. If you will stay long you have a kitchen in your room for you to make your own dishes. Silent neighbourhood very close to the center. Highly recommended.
